trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with an exception that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스를 실행 하는 동안 발생 하는 예외와 연결 된 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When an exception occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> that is associated with the workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>, the workflow tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to an TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]워크플로 인스턴스를 실행 하는 동안 예외가 발생 하는 경우와 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>연결 된 인스턴스가 포함 된 워크플로와의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>에 대해 구성 된는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>, 워크플로 추적 인프라 집합 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>에 TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs에는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>를 추적 서비스로 보내는.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> 정보를 전달 하는 런타임 추적 서비스가 의해서만 사용 됩니다

trans-unit.source: Gets the context ID of the associated activity.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 활동의 컨텍스트 ID를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>의 컨텍스트 ID를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity currently throwing the exception.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>현재 예외를 throw 하는 활동의.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions are passed up the chain of exception handler activities.
trans-unit.target: 예외는 예외 처리기 활동 체인 위로 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An exception handler may choose to throw an exception again.
trans-unit.target: 예외 처리기 다시 예외를 throw 하도록 선택할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When an exception handler throws the exception again, a new exception tracking event containing a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs> is raised to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 예외 처리기에서 throw 할 때 예외를 다시 새를 포함 하는 새 예외 추적 이벤트가 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>는 런타임 추적 인프라에 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: CurrentActivityPath refers to the activity that is currently throwing the exception.
trans-unit.target: CurrentActivityPath 현재 예외를 throw 하는 작업을 가리킵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity currently throwing the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>현재 예외를 throw 하는 활동의.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Exception> that is being thrown by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Exception>워크플로 인스턴스가 throw 되는.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The exception that is being thrown by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스가 throw 되는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity that originally threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>원래 예외를 발생 시킨 작업의.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions are passed up the chain of exception handler activities.
trans-unit.target: 예외는 예외 처리기 활동 체인 위로 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An exception handler may choose to throw an exception again.
trans-unit.target: 예외 처리기 다시 예외를 throw 하도록 선택할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When an exception handler throws an exception again, a new exception tracking event containing a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs> is raised to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 예외 처리기에서 throw 할 때 다시 예외를 새를 포함 하는 새 예외 추적 이벤트가 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>는 런타임 추적 인프라에 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: OriginalActivityPath refers to the activity that originally threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: OriginalActivityPath 원래 예외를 발생 시킨 작업을 가리킵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity that originally threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>원래 예외를 발생 시킨 작업의.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the context ID of the parent activity.
trans-unit.target: 부모 활동의 컨텍스트 ID를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>부모의 컨텍스트 ID를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>
